  • Method Details

    • insertPalette

      public EditorPalette insertPalette​(java.lang.String title)
      This adds a new palette with the given title to the library pane. It also listens when for the library pane is resized, and implements a method, componentResized, to update the widths of all of the palettets in the pane.
      Returns:
      Returns the new palette.

    • setCurrentFile

      public void setCurrentFile​(java.io.File file)
      Updates the current and given files so that the current file is the old file and the given file is the current file. firePropertyChange is notified that a bound property has been changed.
      Parameters:
      file - the new current file.

    • getCurrentFile

      public java.io.File getCurrentFile()
      Returns a refence to the current file.

    • setModified

      public void setModified​(boolean modified)
      Updates the current and given values of this.modified so that the current value of modified is the old value, and the given value of modified is the current value. firePropertyChange is notified that a bound property has been changed.
      Parameters:
      modified - the new value of this.modified.

    • isModified

      public boolean isModified()
      Returns true if this has been modified.

    • bind

      public javax.swing.Action bind​(java.lang.String name, javax.swing.Action action)
      Constructs an instance of a binding given the name and the action.
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the action
      action - is the action being bound to the given name
      Returns:
      a new Action bound to the specified string name

    • bind

      public javax.swing.Action bind​(java.lang.String name, javax.swing.Action action, java.lang.String iconUrl)
      Binds the action argument to the given name and icon. This is done by constructing a new action and passing name and icon as arguments. A new method is implemented to call action.actionPerformed(...).
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the action
      action - calls action performed method and provides the short description for the new action.
      iconUrl - is passed to the new action. If it is null, then the new action's icon will also be null.
      Returns:
      a new Action bound to the specified string name and icon

    • status

      public void status​(java.lang.String msg)
      Updates the text of this status label to string msg.
      Parameters:
      msg - is the new text for the status bar label

    • exit

      public void exit()
      This method disposes of the current frame.

    • setLookAndFeel

      public void setLookAndFeel​(java.lang.String clazz)
      This calls the UI manager to set the look and feel to the given string clazz. The frame component is updated, and keyboardHandler is set to a new instance.

      The UI manager will throw an exeption if the given string clazz is not a valid class name. This method will catch and print the exception and it's backtrace..

      Parameters:
      clazz - is the name of a class that implements the look and feel.

    • createFrame

      public javax.swing.JFrame createFrame​(javax.swing.JMenuBar menuBar)
      Generates a frame with the given menu bar.
      Parameters:
      menuBar - is the menu bar for the new frame.
      Returns:
      Returns the new frame.

    • graphLayout

      public javax.swing.Action graphLayout​(java.lang.String key, boolean animate)
      Creates an action that executes the specified layout.
      Parameters:
      key - Key to be used for getting the label from mxResources and also to create the layout instance for the commercial graph editor example.
      Returns:
      an action that executes the specified layout
